analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern labor relations, industrial regulations, and the establishment of boards and committees to address disputes and ensure fair practices. Several documents relate to the National Industrial Recovery Act and its implementation, including modifications to codes of fair competition and the establishment of the National Labor Board. Other documents focus on resolving labor disputes in the transportation sector and promoting safety for federal employees. A common theme is the government's role in regulating industries and protecting workers' rights.
title: Labor, Industry, and Safety Regulations
